name: jus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a thin sauce made from meat juices: pan-fried beef in a balsamic jus I had slices of veal with a splash of jus and a handful of buttered carrots. au jus
with a thin sauce made from meat juices: Some restaurateurs have renamed their roast prime rib of beef "with natural juice" instead of "au jus".
US used to refer to the sauce itself: Tender roast beef is served with grilled onions and au jus on the side.
